decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings and supporting documents: 1465-LBE-S-XX-DR-A-P-L014 (Existing and Proposed Site Elevations 2/5); 1465-LBE-B1-3D-DR-A-B500 (Existing and Proposed 3D View); Supporting Document "EC 1465_ St Anns School_Exp to 128 - W7 3JP - Photomontage images- to show the view of the Gable End- Existing and Proposed".
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow amendments to the fenestration of the gable end of the single storey extension to front (southwest) elevation of the main school building in relation to planning permission ref: 225039FUL dated 06/04/2023 for 'Single storey extension to front (southwest) elevation of the main school building with associated hard and soft landscaping and ancillary works; single storey extension to front (northeast) secondary building of school; extension of existing walkway; provision of sensory garden (following demolition of two existing garages). (Regulation 3 Application by London Borough of Ealing)'
